One other thing.  We hope to release a 1.8.0 in the next few days. If
you a=
re so inclined as to make a bundle of that release, let us know
and I'll ad=
d the new link to the FAQ.

Also, what did you do to make the bundle?  What=
 changes did you
effect?  Could you make a patch of them or write a page on=
 what you
did and post that to this list also?

Thanks again.
St.Ack

>
> After =
a few days tries, I can get my Heritrix to crawl something
down. I' m

lly very happy with this.
> 
> But I found the info making Heritrix run on =
windows is scattered
over here
> and there. So I integrate these info into =
the Heritrix and made it
run on
> windows a little bit more convenient.
> 
=
> You can download the ready to use Heritrix here:
> http://www.filefactory=
.com/?dbd016
> 
> Download the file and decompress it into D:\heritrix
> 
>=
 then in the CMD console explore into D:\heritrix directory and type
"run".=

index.jsp according to the user manual.
